phrases: Say, Nana Komatsu.
Remember close to our high school graduation,
we stood beside each other and looked onto the school grounds
from the girls' toilet?
Those stories of love you would tell me then?
Please, never tell me those again.
When I was darkness at that time
With trembling lips
The more I struggle
The more this wound deepens
The broken promise hurt me
Nobody can save me
God, I have only one request
Stop tearing apart my love
I need your love
I am a broken rose
Sorrow tumbling down is your song
All alone with nowhere to go in my life
I need your love
I am a broken rose
Oh baby, help me from frozen pain
With your smile, your eyes, and sing me, just for me
I want to need your love
Good to see you.
How've you been?
In any case this place always has no customers.
No, they will come.
I am sure they will come tonight.
Shin and Nobu and Yasu.
Or maybe the members of Trapnest.
What is this?
Did the Demon Lord tell you?
Oh, a customer really came.
Junko.
Congratulations on the grand opening!
Huh?
Why you, Koichi Sato?
I hear you have some serious fans.
They have got to be real maniacs.
They are not maniacs!
So, how is Nana doing lately?
Huh?
By Nana, you mean Nana Komatsu?
Mhm.
She has not dropped by Jackson Hall lately,
and as a result I do not get to appear in this anime much.
Did something happen between her and Shoji?
You really are the worst!
I have totally lost respect for you!
I just did not get a chance to talk about it.
I was not necessarily hiding it.
Do not make excuses!
You were planning on two-timing them, were not you?
Junko!
Do you think I am capable of doing something like that?!
Of course not!
You cannot do it, yet you try and reach for more than you can handle,
and as a result, you hurt a young woman's loving heart.
You think she is hurt.
Of course she is hurt!
Sachiko's in love with you, right?
But maybe I am just hoping that she is.
She has not actually told me that she likes me.
And nothing has changed since.
We still continue seeing each other as no more than friends.
Your intellectual level has remained the same since junior high.
This is nonsense!
Junko!
Do not talk to me like that!
What should I do to make things right?!
You hafta put an end to this.
So Sachiko's more important to you than Nana?
You are wrong!
Koichi
Sato, I am going to work!
I am going to break ties with her!
I will do what I can to be buried in the same grave with Nana!
Sorry to keep you.
Let us hurry.
Wait, Sachiko!
I hafta talk to you about something.
You know!
Sorry.
- I am really sorry. - You have done nothing wrong, Shoji.
I jumped to conclusions on my own and got carried away.
I will be careful not to interfere.
I will never interfere in your relationship with your girlfriend.
So... please.
Cannot we at least be friends?
Do not ask me to end this.
That is strange.
Shoji should be done with work, but I get his answering service.
I wonder if he forgot to switch it on.
He is probably cheating on you.
Shoji would not do such a thing!
I will send him an email.
You know, there is nothing we can do about Shoji.
You know, I did not think he was the kind of guy
who was capable of cheating, by any means.
As far as I know, neither did I!
He is not just fooling around, either.
He is serious about the other girl.
He is seriously fallen in love with Sachiko.
He is no longer able to think rationally or morally.
There is nothing we can do.
Shoji!
I came.
Hachi would not shut up about wanting to see you.
Umm...
Then allow me to show you to your table.
This way, please.
Sachiko.
They are finally finished.
Someone is coming out.
Really?
Sachiko!
What are you doing?
What is with this woman?
She is my girlfriend.
Huh?!
You telling me that you have two girlfriends?
You sure have it good!
Do not!
Sachiko!
It is okay, stay back!
Do not be violent with Shoji!
Stay out of this!
This has nothing to do with you!
You are the one who has nothing to do with this!
If you want to hit someone, hit me!
H-Hey!
I was the one who had a crush on him!
I knew he had a girlfriend, and still I could not stop myself!
Hachiko!
Why are you just standing there?!
This is your fight!
You do something!
If you do not fight, you have accepted defeat!
He is your man, is not he?
Fight to get him back!
I do not want him.
I do not even want to see his face.
Is that so.
So that is what happened.
That is right.
Hey, speaking of the cheating fellow.
He is getting closer.
Oh, he is leaving.
You fool.
It is because you tease him too much.
Hey, Shoji.
Come over here.
Let us drink together.
I am home.
Hachiko!
A live show!
A live show!
They had an opening in an upcoming event at Shimokita,
and they are letting us fill that spot and play.
Huh?
It is for thirty minutes on May 5th!
Yay!
Do not cry, Hachiko!
We are going to party today!
Thank you.
I see.
And has Nana been able to recover from her problems?
Well, yeah, I guess you could say she recovered, but...
Huh?
Then she is back to feeling depressed again?
Oh, no worry of that.
She is had many things going on, one after another.
And did I mention many things?
Hm?
Let him tell you the story, Koichi Sato.
Being able to have dinner with the BLAST band members,
and the chance to talk with Nana...
I am so happy I could die.
It is like I am still in some dream.
You are exaggerating.
No, really.
I have been a BLAST fan since the very beginning,
but nothing like this has ever happened.
It really is like a dream to me.
I see.
When you say since the very beginning, when was that?
It was with the first set of members, back when Ren was in the band.
So, almost four years ago?
It was a shock when Ren left BLAST, but do not you think Shin, the new bassist,
plays just like Ren does?
So at the live concert it was like a revival of the BLAST of old times.
I was really thrilled.
Name a guitarist you respect.
Ren Honjo!
That is the flower of the lotus, is not it?
Why did you choose the lotus?
Actually, it is the ren.
No way.
Still that is no reason to come to my place.
Please tell me, Nobu.
You know a lot about this, do not you?
Ren was BLAST's bassist.
He and Nana were lovers and they lived together,
but two years ago he was offered the chance
to become Trapnest's guitarist.
He came to Tokyo alone, and no one's heard from him since.
So I told him everything.
Wait!
No one's heard from him since?
Then what about him and Nana?
They had a tearful breakup, right?
That is right.
And there is nothing left for me to tell you.
I do not hate Ren and I do not want to badmouth him,
but Ren decided to leave BLAST and join Trapnest
without talking it over with Nana or myself.
Only Yasu knew about it.
So at that time, I really felt betrayed, and it was a great shock.
As a fellow musician, my pride was shot down
and I could not shake off this feeling of utter defeat.
But both Nana and I acknowledged Ren's talents and we respected that.
We could predict that this would be better for Ren's sake,
and of course, that proved to be true.
I believe this was the best outcome.
But Nana,.,
Back then, she could have gone with him if she desired.
But rather than choose happiness as a woman,
she chose to protect her pride.
I think that is the reason why she is so insistent on
succeeding as a musician, no matter what.
She has her heart set on someday
reaching the level of success Ren,., Trapnest is enjoying.
From time to time, it pains me to see that about her.
Do you still love Ren?
You knew.
I am sorry.
Acting as if I did not know.
But,.,
You brought me here knowing, right?
Thank you.
Ren...
Hm?
That thing you said earlier.
Is it true?
Which one?
Right now, I am not about to give up my pride
so I cannot live with you like we used to.
But it would be nice if we could maybe meet like this from time to time.
Hold each other and talk about each other.
And one day when we are much older, when I no longer care about
pride and vanity, when I have grown tired of singing...
Then can I return to that home too?
So that is pretty much what happened.
Huh?
Where did Koichi Sato go?
He went home a moment ago.
Did he pay?
There.
He left a Jackson Burger for you.
Barter trade?!
But I love his Jackson Burgers!
Though that one's already cold.
What is Ms. Sakagami, age 38, doing here?
Because of her serious fans...
who do not exist.
No they do not.
- Excuse me, you people over there.
- Y-Yes?
I hear you are friends of Nana Komatsu.
What is it with that girl?
First of all, when it comes to her work ethics...
You know this woman is your typical character
who ends up having very few appearances.
Even fewer than Koichi Sato.
Mhm.
This is very strange.
Why are we visited by
all these characters who hardly appear in the show?
That is because this is where
the Characters with Few Appearances gather.
- Huh? - Huh?
With you three at the lead.
Th-That is impossible.
We will have many more appearances.
You will have no more.
- That is not your decision to make! -
That is not your decision to make!
You have got plenty blooming lately right in your own garden.
I want happiness as soon as possible too.
Or rather, a boyfriend.
Then we will organize a party.
Not that way.
I want a love that is meant to be.
Oh, but now that you mention it, a party might be good, too.
Say, Yasu, do you have a girlfriend?
Unfortunately, I am not popular with the women.
Say, Nobu, do not you have a girlfriend?
I do not.
Presently recruiting within-reach characters.
Super within-reach character
Miss Komatsu!
How long is it taking you to sort those postcards?
You really are slow!
Miss Komatsu!
Cannot you even make copies properly?!
I will call you later.
Come on, Ms. Sakagami.
What are you doing here wasting time?
Please get back to work.
Ms. Sakagami!
The Chief says I am fired!
- Naturally. - Huh?
No way.
Ms. Sakagami.
Although you were hard on me,
I thought you were the kind of person who would stand up for me in the end.
Do you think the world exists for you?!
It is a result of how spoiled you have been acting.
Farewell.
Unidentified Caller
- Yes? - Nana?
It is me, Takumi.
Do you have a moment to talk?
Sure.
I reached into the sky
But I could not reach what I wanted
They grew smaller and disappeared into the sky
Like colorful balloons
I am alone
My hand had no place to go
And gently you took it
Starless night
I will not look back at the shadow of my past
I want to feel your warmth
Tears are falling down
Even if I am unsure I will not let go
Of your hand holding mine
Until the next time!
- Goodbye! - You are pathetic.
